How can I view what card was charged for which transactions?

To view the card charged for specific transactions, you can check the 'Transaction History' under the 'Billing' tab in your NewsBreak account. This section will provide details on each payment made, including the card used for the transaction.
I see the transaction history, it just says "card' but not which card

If the transaction history only shows 'card' without specifying which card was used, you might need to check the 'Payment Methods' section in your account settings. This section should list all cards associated with your account, and you can cross-reference the transaction dates with the cards listed there. If you need further assistance, feel free to reach out to adsupport@newsbreak.com.
